FuncDef:
The vlan-swap enable command enables VLAN tag swapping.
The undo vlan-swap enable command disables VLAN tag swapping.
By default, this function is disabled on an interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
If both inner and outer tags of all packets transmitted on an interface need to be swapped, run the vlan-swap enable command on the interface. After VLAN tag swapping is configured on the interface, all its sub-interfaces are enabled with VLAN tag swapping automatically.
Configuration Impact
The vlan-swap enable command swaps the two VLAN tags of double-tagged packets and has no impact on single-tagged packets.
